front.title: Address Management for Mobile SCTP Handover

abstract.t: This document describes an address management module for mobile Stream Control Transmission Protocol (mSCTP). The module is used for a mobile node to manage the IP addresses associated with an mSCTP association. The address management module utilizes the link layer signal strength information in order to determine when to add or delete end-point IP addresses of a mobile node and how to change the primary path from the mSCTP association when a handover happens.
